content: Hi, I'm having trouble with my account. I keep getting charged for services I don't use.
I apologize for the inconvenience. Can you please provide me with your account details so I can look into this further?
My account number is XXX-1234 and my email address is john.doe@example.com.

Thank you for providing that information. I've located your account and it appears to be in good standing. However, I did notice that you have a subscription to our premium service that you haven't used recently.
I remember signing up for the premium service, but I don't recall using any of its features. Can you please cancel my subscription and remove the charges?
